mapper.sql: t.id, t.create_by AS "createBy.id", t.create_date, t.update_by AS "updateBy.id", t.update_date, t.del_flag, t.remarks, t.name, t.certificate_type, t.certificate_no, t.birthday, t.birthplace, t.address, t.occupation, t.work_unit, t.contact_way, t.relationship_with_debtor, t.once_home, t.foreign_debt
